message.body: Why does dad have to stress me out?!?? I'm directing 2 fucking projects in 3 fucking days from start to finish. I'm running on 1 hour of sleep. I broke down at 3 am and cried for a straight 30 minutes. I have a midterm paper due Monday. I'm trying to get a job. And now he tells me we can't fucking pay for school and if I want to keep going I have to find more scholarships. Its impossible for me not to have a seizure at this point.

Dude. He's telling me that too. Just chill. He's all in my face about it. And kk is over and he's like do scholarships and I'm like, that would be kinda rude to kk. You punk bitch. Idk. I wouldn't fret.
God. I hope Matt gets a full ride someplace because this is fucking bullshit.
Mr. Leising is my spirit animal. We both wore gray hoodies to church today.
